tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Let's Get On The Same Page

definition.text: I just brought you to the one hour chart! Before discussing what we see here, let's take a minute to organize your chart.

paragraphs.text: That way I can make sure you see the same things I see!
Bollinger Data layer manager: Turn everything off but the Bollinger Bands layers.
Simulation Objects layer manager: Turn everything off but the "Strategies" and "Trigger Stages" layers.
Trading System layer manager: Turn everything off but the "Trading System Errors", "Highlights", and "Values" layers.
Trading Engine layer manager: Turn everything off.
The next video shows what I see... and what you should!
